entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having scarlet eyes and laughing in a cold, mirthless manner. ("Voldemort turned his scarlet eyes upon Harry, laughing a high, cold, mirthless laugh.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, being looked at by Voldemort. ("Voldemort turned his scarlet eyes upon Harry...")

relationships.description: Voldemort is looking at Harry. ("Voldemort turned his scarlet eyes upon Harry...")
